name: The Disturbing Truth
description: You, a private detective get an unusual inheritance case. The grandfather's client left him an estate contract, but he's kept it hidden...and now he's dead. You are left with an ambiguous letter, and in the hopes to find clues, you drive to his late house to investigate. It all seems like an easy case, until a twisted family story uncovers itself. A creepy, old, lonely house...and all its weird sounds...it must've been the wind, right? Find the clues, figure out the puzzles and uncover the mystery of grandpa Joe's family!
